method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Footnote.

parameter.name: at
parameter.shortdesc: The location of the footnote reference number in the main text relative to the reference object or within the story. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Must be an insertion point or a note. Required when the at parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: Note or InsertionPoint. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Footnote &#40;Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Footnote with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Footnote with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Footnote with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Footnotes within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The Footnote, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Footnote, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Footnote, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Footnote, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Footnote in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Footnote in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Footnote in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Footnote with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the Footnote that follows the desired Footnote.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Footnote whose index follows the specified Footnote in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The Footnote whose index comes before the desired Footnote.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Footnote in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Footnote in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Footnote.
Returns the Footnote with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
